scripts.setup-dev: git config core.hooksPath .githooks && npm run install-all:dev
scripts.install-all: npm i && cd client && npm i
scripts.ci-all: npm ci --only=production && cd client && npm ci --only=production
scripts.ci-all:dev: npm ci && cd client && npm ci
scripts.build: npx tsc && cd client && npm run build
scripts.test: npx jest --passWithNoTests && cd client && npm run test
scripts.lint: npx eslint src test client/src/components client/src/__tests__ --ext "js, ts, jsx, tsx"
